extension.name: Module liste fabrik en VueJS
extension.author: Merveille Gbetegan
extension.description: Affiche en VueJS un tableau à partir des données du liste Fabrik

field.name: fabrik_list_id
field.label: Liste fabrik
field.query: SELECT id, label FROM #__fabrik_lists where published = 1

field.name: fabrik_list_particular_conditional_column
field.label: Particular Showing column list (SQL where clause column name). Columns list separed by comma Ex: col1,col2,col3

field.name: fabrik_list_particular_conditional_column_values
field.label: Particular Showing where column value (SQL clause column values), multiple column values separed by '|' . Ex : col1_value_1|col1_value_2,col2_value,col3_value

field.name: fabrik_list_column_to_be_shown_as_badge
field.label: Particular Showing column as badge . Columns list separed by comma Ex: col1,col2,col3

field.name: fabrik_list_column_to_not_show_when_filtered_by
field.label: Unwanted columns to show in table list when filtered by . Columns list separed by comma Ex: col1,col2,col3

field.name: fabrik_list_readonly_profiles
field.label: Profiles eMundus en lecture seule
field.query: SELECT id, label FROM #__emundus_setup_profiles where published = 0
